code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import NotFoundPage from'./NotFoundPage';import articles from'./article-content';import CommentsList from'../components/CommentsList';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ArticlePage=()=>{const[articleInfo,setArticleInfo]=useState({upvotes:0,comments:[]});const{articleId}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{const loadArticleInfo=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/articles/".concat(articleId));const newArticleInfo=response.data;setArticleInfo(newArticleInfo);}catch(error){console.error("Error loading article info:",error);}};loadArticleInfo();},[articleId]);const article=articles.find(article=>article.name===articleId);if(!article){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NotFoundPage,{});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["This article has ",articleInfo.upvotes," upvote(s)"]}),article.content.map((paragraph,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:paragraph},i)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommentsList,{comments:articleInfo.comments})]});};export default ArticlePage;
